CS #MonicaJuma held bilateral talks with Pakistani Foreign Secretary Tehmina Janjua at Pakistan Foreign Affairs offices. They discussed ways of enhancing bilateral relations between the two countries and urgently review and refocus  JMC which last met in 2004.
